ja505:1.4: Kvajja setu → ko nvajja seti (mr); ko ajja setu (?)
ja505:5.4: Jīvaṃ maṃ netvā → jīvaṃ panetvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja505:9.4: Tasmā ahaṃ brūmi gahappatīti” → brāhmaṇo gahapati tena hoti (si, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja505:5.1: Sa → idaṃ bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ja505:15.1: Bhuttā ca me → bhuttā me (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja505:15.2: Parivārito → parivāritā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); paricāritā (mr) | accharānaṃ gaṇena → accharāsaṃ gaṇena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja505:23.3: Mātuñca → mātu ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); mātucca (pts-vp-pli1)
